about_the_game:
Why choose one of the 4 mixtapes in "Monster Roadtrip" when you can get 'em all with this bombastic OST?!

Wanna get chill? Go "Lo Fi Beats".
Feel like partying? Then hit the "Tropical Rave".
What if you want to go all in on the "road trip in the desert" fantasy? We have "Desert Vibes" for you.
Or maybe you prefer Monster Prom's classic style? Then "Surf Rock" will be your jam!

As if having the contents of 4 mixtapes wasn't enough, there's also a secret final mixtape we like to call "Other Cool Songs": from the banger that is "Five Stars, Ten out of Ten" to the overly-suggestive "Whale Sex Jazz".

Oh, and there's also 2 full minutes of the Pancake Song, which alone should be enough to convince you to get this soundtrack. Because, you know... even if you don't like pancakes, you will have to sing along.
detailed_description:
Why choose one of the 4 mixtapes in "Monster Roadtrip" when you can get 'em all with this bombastic OST?!

Wanna get chill? Go "Lo Fi Beats".
Feel like partying? Then hit the "Tropical Rave".
What if you want to go all in on the "road trip in the desert" fantasy? We have "Desert Vibes" for you.
Or maybe you prefer Monster Prom's classic style? Then "Surf Rock" will be your jam!

As if having the contents of 4 mixtapes wasn't enough, there's also a secret final mixtape we like to call "Other Cool Songs": from the banger that is "Five Stars, Ten out of Ten" to the overly-suggestive "Whale Sex Jazz".

Oh, and there's also 2 full minutes of the Pancake Song, which alone should be enough to convince you to get this soundtrack. Because, you know... even if you don't like pancakes, you will have to sing along.
